Hi Igor, 
 
> Sure. Decide rules are pretty flexible. Maybe: 
>  
> 1) Add =
SeedAcceptDecideRule after the 
NotMatchesFilePatternDecideRule rule. 
> 2)=
 Replace "reject NotMatchesFilePatternDecideRule" rule, with 
reject  
> Ma=
tchesFilePatternDecideRule. Just create regex of file extensions 
that  
> =
you don't want to crawl. 
>  
 
Yes, it also works fine. 
Thanks a lot! 
 
=
Regards, 
Artem.
